coordinateTransform.i18nChooseCrsByTyping: Select the source and target CRS by typing into the fields.
coordinateTransform.i18nChooseCrsBySelecting: Select the source and target CRS from the lists below.
coordinateTransform.i18nDescription:
Enter coordinates that should get transformed in the textfield on the lower left side.
Coordinates have to be separated by comma, multiple coordinate pairs by semicolon.
